dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ISNULL(RTRIM(FC.CASE_ID), '|') AS 'CaseID' ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), EE.FILING_DT, 101) AS 'DateStamped' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EE.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC)) = '' THEN ' ' ELSE ISNULL(EE.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC, ' ') END AS 'Description' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EEN.ADDITIONAL_COMMENTS)) = '' THEN ' ' ELSE ISNULL(EEN.ADDITIONAL_COMMENTS, ' ') END AS 'Comments' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ECD.EVENT_ENT_CAT_DESC)) = '' THEN ' ' ELSE ISNULL(ECD.EVENT_ENT_CAT_DESC, ' ') END AS 'EventCategory' ,EE.USER_ID AS 'ModifiedBy' -- ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE -- ( CASE WHEN si.SESSION_ITEM_ID IS NULL THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), --FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101), '|')END ) END AS 'NextSession' ,(SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A1.ITEM_START_DT) IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),MAX(A1.ITEM_START_DT),101) ELSE '|' END FROM ACC_SESSION_ITEM A1 WHERE A1.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID) AS 'NextSession' ,EE.DATE_TIME_MOD FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_CASE ETC on ETC.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY EE on EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETC.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY_NOTES EEN on EEN.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENT_CAT ECD on ECD.EVENT_ENTRY_CAT_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_CAT_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_TYP CT ON FC.CASE_TYP_ID = CT.CASE_TYP_ID LEFT JOIN ACC_SESSION_ITEM SI ON FC.CASE_ID = SI.CASE_ID WHERE FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND EE.IS_SEALED_FLG <> 'Y' AND EE.IS_RESTRICTED_FLG <> 'Y' AND EE.ROA_HIDDEN <> 'Y' AND EE.IS_DRAFT <> 'Y' AND CT.CASE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('ADP','COM')

dataquery.name: Incremental
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ISNULL(RTRIM(FC.CASE_ID), '|') AS 'CaseID' ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), EE.FILING_DT, 101) AS 'DateStamped' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EE.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC)) = '' THEN ' ' ELSE ISNULL(EE.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC, ' ') END AS 'Description' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EEN.ADDITIONAL_COMMENTS)) = '' THEN ' ' ELSE ISNULL(EEN.ADDITIONAL_COMMENTS, ' ') END AS 'Comments' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ECD.EVENT_ENT_CAT_DESC)) = '' THEN ' ' ELSE ISNULL(ECD.EVENT_ENT_CAT_DESC, ' ') END AS 'EventCategory' ,EE.USER_ID AS 'ModifiedBy' -- ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, --101))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), --FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101), '|') END AS 'NextSession' ,(SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A1.ITEM_START_DT) IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),MAX(A1.ITEM_START_DT),101) ELSE '|' END FROM ACC_SESSION_ITEM A1 WHERE A1.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID) AS 'NextSession' ,EE.DATE_TIME_MOD FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_CASE ETC on ETC.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY EE on EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETC.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY_NOTES EEN on EEN.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENT_CAT ECD on ECD.EVENT_ENTRY_CAT_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_CAT_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_TYP CT ON FC.CASE_TYP_ID = CT.CASE_TYP_ID WHERE FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND EE.IS_SEALED_FLG <> 'Y' AND EE.IS_RESTRICTED_FLG <> 'Y' AND EE.ROA_HIDDEN <> 'Y' AND EE.IS_DRAFT <> 'Y' AND CT.CASE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('ADP','COM') AND (EE.DATE_TIME_CREATED > DATEADD(HH,-2,GETDATE()) OR EE.DATE_TIME_MOD > DATEADD(HH,-2,GETDATE()))
